title: Chocolate Antigua, Handmade Hot Chocolate Drink, Mayan Cacao Powder, Hand Carved with All Natural Ingredients for a Perfect Taza - From San Juan del Obispo, Antigua Guatemala (Cinnamon (Canela))
features: POUND OF LOVE: This bag contains 1 lb of chocolate powder. Ready to sip after adding boiled water or hot milk, and 4 large spoons of this magic powder, although we won't judge if you like it extra chunky or light.
HAND CARVED: All our cacao is carved by hand in granite milestones, adding natural sugar and if flavored, any other natural ingredient to complement the perfect taza.
FOR EVERYONE: All your family can enjoy this sweet bag of chocolate, it was designed so that any child or grown up could enjoy the lovely tradition of hot cocoa mornings.
ANTIGUA GUATEMALA: Made in the skirts of the Agua Volcano, in the town of San Juan del Obispo.

UNIQUE GIFT: Organically prepared and made with love in the historic Antigua Guatemala, this is a gift that will make a lasting impression. The Mayanâ€™s believed cacao to be a gift from the gods, so pass on this special gift to your friends and loved ones.
description: ORIGIN: Grown in the Guatemalan lowlands, harvested from the fruit and roasted to perfection. All our chocolate is made by a family owned business, with chocolate artisans passing down their knowledge for more than 6 generations. CACAO BENEFITS:With no preservatives, this bag of love can help lower blood pressure and can elevate mood and serotonin. Gluten-Free, Dairy-Free, Soy-Free, and Vegan 100% CHAPIN:: This chocolate is 100% Guatemalan. Every Guatemalan knows how good our hot chocolate can be. Hand-carved in granite millstones to make these rustic organic Guatemalan style chocolate explode your taste buds.
